mdRecord.dcterms:title: Grand majestic production! Superb revival!: Anthony & Ellis' famous ideal Uncle Tom's Cabin Co. and Memphis University students, the only standard company recognized by press and public, producing in America Mrs. Stowe's immortal work, Uncle Tom's Cabin
Anthony & Ellis' famous ideal Uncle Tom's Cabin
Uncle Tom's Cabin on stage
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anthony, A. S.
Ellis, H. M.
Memphis University Students.
Uncle Tom's Cabin Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memphis University students -- Marks and his trick donkey -- Slave auction -- Dancing Blacks -- Topsy playing a banjo -- Eliza's escape and pursuit by "imported trained Negro-hunting Siberian bloodhounds" -- Death of Eliza.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Robert & Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 1999/2000.
